Text:
Gonna try this new show...
Thanks for the upload... And special thanks for the subtitles...

Thanks for this. I remember seeing a flashy advert for this a while ago. Good to see Jason Clarke getting a prominent role. 

Any one know if this is any good?

Allow me to reply to my own question: I just watched 7 episodes in a row and drank half a bottle of scotch. 

Not bad at all.
